name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 5
description:
A brand-new Hawaiian island will be added to the game at the launch of Season 5 - in November 2024 - for free!

Maui, a captivating jewel in the Hawaiian crown - the island embodies an exquisite blend of culture, adventure, and natural wonders, thus offering an enchanting setting for the Motorfest Festival.

From the vibrant energy of Kahului urban grounds to the awe-inspiring landscapes of Haleakalā National Park and its bamboo forest, going through the iconic Ohe’o Gulch sacred pools with its cascading waterfalls, Maui beckons with endless exploration.

Maui will add a whopping 345km of total road network to the game, with 229km of that being asphalt and 190km of dirt roads. So, get ready for some amazing island exploration!

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Anno 117: Pax Romana
description:
In the latest instalment of the award-winning Anno strategy franchise, it’s your destiny to shape the Roman Empire in the year 117 AD. As governor, will you encourage economic growth or expand your rule through dominance? Lead with rebellion or unite a diverse culture?
The cost of peace is yours to decide.

name: Riders Republic: Season 11
description: Sin descripción

name: The Book of Buja
description: Explore the vast, open world of Darrow. Solve puzzles and collect the six Stalm Pirate remains. With the help of the Zapra Viti Hourglass and your ability to peer into a corpse's demise, uncover the mystery behind the Queen's untimely death.

name: Cienie
description: Cienie is a mystery-thriller visual novel with supernatural elements set in the Polish town of Sypniewo. You follow Tomasz Tyszko, a law university dropout who now interns at a private investigation agency run by Markus Waldner. After five individuals are reported missing in the town, Tom tries to unravel the mystery behind the disappearances while navigating the complexities of relationships and adulthood.

name: Viper-V6
description:
Viper V-6 is the first in the long-running Viper series of animated adult games. It contains three separate stories:The Devil Came* tells the story of a teenager named Ogawa, who was unpopular in his class and summoned a demon to exact revenge. But the demon turned out to be female, so his wishes naturally assume a different direction...

Afternoon describes a scene during a beauty contest. The defeated participant thinks that she was unfairly judged, but her fury at the winner turns, in front of the amazed spectators, into erotic desire...

Double Impact features two young female detectives, Miho and Kumi, who pretend to search for jobs as maids in order to infiltrate a mansion in which mysterious disappearances have been taking place.

All the three stories are very short and can perhaps be better described as "scenes"; the entire game can be completed within several minutes. The interaction is reduced to absolute minimum, with an occasion decision to make, and is available only in The Devil Came (in which it is also possible to die if the player makes a wrong decision); the two other stories are non-interactive, the only input being pressing the return key to advance to the next scene. What sets "Viper V-6" (and the whole series) apart from most other Japanese adult games - beside the "three stories in one" concept - is the fact that most of its sex scenes are animated.

name: Viper-V8
description:
The second entry in Sogna's long-running Viper franchise, Viper V-8 has the same format as its predecessor: three separate short stories with minimal interaction and animated sex scenes.

The three stories are:Friday the 18th*: Obviously, a parody on horror movies, telling the story of three young girls who were sexually assaulted by mysterious masked men when camping near a forest.

Demon's Night is set in medieval times and describes a battle of three young heroes against a vicious demon. One of them is killed in battle, while the other (a girl) is captured by the demon; the remaining warrior, a young man named Ryu, has to rescue his friend.

Alien Wars takes place in the future. A young space pilot named Sylvie is ambushed and captured by aliens who have nothing else in mind but to have sex with her...

There is some rudimentary interaction in all the three stories: "Friday the 18th" allows the player to switch from one heroine to another (even though there is only one correct way to do that); "Demon's Night" has a scene with pseudo-RPG turn-based combat (pre-determined results); both "Demon's Night" and "Alien Wars" offer some menu-based choices to make, some of which will lead to Game Over.

name: The Wisdom of the Minotaur
description:
The minotaur is a creature that stands at the boundary between human and animal. To be in-between boxes is to be a monster, something to be ostracized. So, really, you ought to choose if you want to be a man or a woman already. Don't you know the consequences if you don't?

A short, surreal kinetic novel about gender.

name: Dungeon of Fercho'po
description: Jam Theme: Solitude - You are a lone treasure hunter exploring a once abandoned dungeon. You will face the perils that lurk inside without any party members or renewable supplies. Try your best to get the loot and then make it back out alive!

name: Make a Good Mega Man Level Contest 3
description:
Make a Good Mega Man Level Contest 3 is a Classic Mega Man Level Design Contest turned into a fully-fledged fangame, and the largest one yet!
Clear the contest entries, explore the hub worlds and witness the overarching plot unravel as you soak in the game's myriad of content!

name: Once Upon a Galaxy
description:
Once Upon a Galaxy is a mobile based card battler brought to you by Million Dreams.

Recruit a rag-tag squad of fairy book characters, heroes from legend, scheming villains and treasure hoarding dragons as they do battle across the galaxy where last one standing wins.

name: Facing Demons: Chara Battle
description: You finally reached the Final Coridor completing another Genocide route. You once again faced your nemesis - Chara Dreemurr, but this time something seems off. Ready your chainsaw, darling! The last actor is on the scene!

name: Caiaque
description: Sin descripción

name: Emoji Quiz Football
description:
Guess the Footballer by Emojis 2024

If you like quiz games + emojis and you love football, then this guessing football game app by emojis is for you!

Can you guess all the players, clubs, managers, stadiums and football legends?

name: Arena of Dreams
description:
Arena of Dreams is a free multiplayer party royale packed with various mini-games.

Survive and Thrive: Be the last one standing! Survive, advance and win medals if you reach the podium at the end of the rounds! Ensure your survival by teaming up in Co-op mode to tackle challenges that can only be found in your wildest dreams. Dive into a surreal and thrilling universe full of fun, action-packed adventure challenges!

name: Mega Drive
description: A model of the Mega Drive released by Tec Toy in Brazil in 2017. It has a cartridge slot, but comes with an SD card with 22 games.

name: BugBurgh
description:
Care for a little village of cute lil bugs!
Explore the forest, forage for food, gather resources, construct little houses and buildings, watch the little village grow and try to keep everyone happy!
How many bugs can you care for? How many bugs is too many bugs?

name: Pac-Man World 2
description: The Pac-Man World first release of Pac-Man World 2 has many gameplay differences from the later versions/ports, which were adapted to be easier.

name: 3 Kings
description: In this pocket roguelike strategy game, you have to build a kingdom powerful enough to withstand the other king's invasions and be crowned the king of kings.

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!: Nerae!? Ring x Bongole Trainers
description: Katekyoo Hitman Reborn Nerae!? Ring x Bongole Trainers is a Visual Novel video game published by Marvelous Entertainment released on August 28th, 2008 for the PlayStation 2.

name: Mini TD 2: Relax Tower Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Armor Battle
description: A simulator of the handheld game Armor Battle.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend 3
description: Spring 2019—the first year of Reiwa—but even as Japan rings in a new era, nothing ever changes for Seiji and his sleepy student ways. Aside from the arrival of new hottie Maja, who joined his class in the winter, each month so far has proven to be as brain-numbingly dull as the last. Until...

name: Asterix: Hunt for the Boars
description: A digital simulator of the handheld game of the same name.

name: Banana
description: A digital simulator of the handheld game of the same name.

name: Baseball
description: A simulator of the handheld game Baseball by VTech.

name: Caccia al Ladro
description: A digital simulator of the handheld game Caccia al Ladro/Heathcliff.

name: Sonic Utopia
description: Sonic Utopia is a 2D Sonic fangame created by BlueFrenzy in 2006 made with Klik &Play. It is most well known for its original zone Panic City, which has since made appearences in Ring Racers and Sonic Legends (Two other famous Sonic Fangames). It is not to be confused with Sonic Utopia (2020) by Mr. Lange.

name: Sonic Gaiden
description:
Sonic Gaiden is a 2003 fan-made hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog game for the Sega Mega Drive.

This hack is significant in the Sonic ROM-hacking community for several reasons. First, it's a hack of a Sonic 1 title; at the time of its release, such hacks were slightly rarer as Sonic 2 was the most frequently hacked Sonic game. Secondly, it is a hack of the Japanese Sonic 1 ROM; the U.S. Sonic 1 is more commonly used, but the Japanese revision has added features such as scrolling clouds and rippling water. Thirdly, the hack allows the option to play as either Sonic or as Mighty the Armadillo, who became popular as a founding member of the Chaotix crew and as a playable character in SegaSonic the Hedgehog. In addition, the hack includes new levels with new artwork and separate endings for each character.

name: Sonic Frenzy Adventure
description: Sonic Frenzy Adventure is a retro-style fangame developed since 2004, featuring 11 zones and 5 playable characters, including two original ones. The game introduces unique mechanics such as a revised ring system with four levels, various shields with passive effects, and special powers exclusive to Sonic. Players explore each zone, ending in a boss fight, with a storyline focused on defeating EggRobo's mechanical empire. Achievements track high scores and hidden collectibles, and the game offers character-specific routes and challenges.

name: Menhera Ota-hime Circle: Needy Princess Nerd Club
description: The story follows a student named Sugihara Natsuki, who joins an otaku club and meets the only female member, Mizushiro Kaoruko, who is a typical otaku girl that wears lolita clothes and doesn't use makeup. Natsuki and Kaoruko become close and eventually start a romantic relationship, but Kaoruko's status as a "taken" girl leads her to become arrogant and cause conflicts with other girls in their school. In order to feel valued again, Kaoruko decides to become the "princess" of the otaku club, which causes Natsuki to feel excluded and unsure of their relationship.

name: Abaddon
description: Abaddon is a first-person psychological horror game steeped in Lovecraftian elements. Descend into a haunting story as you take on the role of Jimmy, searching for his missing brother Georgie while confronting his past in a nightmarish world.

name: Legofaction
description: Sin descripción

name: Ronin's Requiem
description: In Ronin's Requiem you play as a ninja who has fallen from grace and now, to regain his honor, he has to eliminate an army of demons in a foreign land. Ronin's Requiem is a fast-paced platformer with solid gameplay and fast-paced combat.

name: Dawn of Defiance
description: You are the Defier, subjected to a mythic plot across ruined isles. In this Greek myth-inspired survival craft, ascend from weak soldier to god-like anti-hero. Build impressive Greek structures, craft and upgrade your gear, and face down the trials of Gods with up to 3 friends.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York
description: Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York is a narrative game set in the World of Darkness Universe. Play as one of the members of the Vampire Clans in a shifting political landscape between the Camarilla and the Anarchs while trying your best to survive.

name: Prezzemolo in un Viaggio da Sogno
description: "Prezzemolo in un Viaggio da Sogno" is the second PC video game based on the mascot of Gardaland , the dragon Parsley . It is the sequel to "Prezzemolo in una giornata da incubo" and, like its predecessor, in addition to being a point and click adventure , it has some voice actors from the animated series also inspired by Parsley.

name: NBA Panini Dunk
description: Take part in collecting, playing, and dominating the league with NBA Dunk! Be the GM of your team and use your collection of cards to enter into a real time contest against online opponents. As well as chat with NBA fans around the world to make trades and build your collection up to the max!

name: Keychain
description: Keychain is a short game made by Ivan Zanotti & fran43 for GMTK Game Jam 2019. In Keychain your survival depends on how you use the keys you find.

name: Pokemon Garbage Gold
description: To begin, Garbage Gold is a trashmon hack, meaning the player will only be able to obtain and use weak Pokemon. In most cases, these Pokemon will be less than 425 BST (combined base stat total). There are some exceptions, but this is the general rule. A wide variety of encounters are available, and are significantly different from vanilla Heart Gold. Evolution levels are changed, and some Pokemon wont evolve at all if the evolutions are too good.

name: Hunter Moonstrike
description: Hunter Moonstrike is the first survival game integrated with artificial intelligence. In this game, all npc have their own unique story and you can see the story of the game from their point of view. Talk to any person, ask any question you like, they will answer and think they are alive

name: Bomb Fight
description: A simulator of the handheld game of the same name.

name: Cessate il Fuoco
description: A digital simulator of the handheld of the same name.

name: Donkey Kong
description: A simulator of the Coleco Tabletop port of Donkey Kong.

name: Donkey Kong
description: A simulator of the Game & Watch Multi Screen port of Donkey Kong.

name: Donkey Kong "Special Edition"
description: A second simulator by the same creator for the Game & Watch Multi Screen port of Donkey Kong. This version has additional features.

name: Donkey Kong II
description: A digital simulator based on the Game & Watch Multi Screen handheld under the same name.

name: Tear Ripple
description:
Please see what i can't see. say the word that i can't say
A letter from me to you

name: The Stanley Parable: Raphael Parable
description:
The Raphael Parable is a community-made modification for The Stanley Parable, being the most popular mod created for the game along with Experiment 427 and the Escape Pod Ending Overwrite Mod.
The Raphael Parable expands the Office to contain several new areas, new visual assets such as furniture, and new Narrator dialogue. Unlike the main game, The Raphael Parable only contains two endings.

name: Matchbox's Pizza Adventure
description: A Short Pixel-Art Platformer Game!

name: Experiment 427
description:
Experiment 427 is a free modification for The Stanley Parable. During development, the modification got abandoned and never got finished. There is a beta version, however.
The mod begins when a player activates the Confusion Ending and clicks on the Confusion Schedule. The player is then teleported out of the map on the opposite side of the Confusion Schedule and begins a new adventure. The mod was also going to customize the game's textures, add new objects, change the main plot, and add new rooms.

name: Raining City: Millions Recollections
description: One night, Luxuan woke up soaked in blood, a mysterious black hole in the palm of her hand – and millions pouring out of that hole, like an unstoppable fountain of wealth. Still in shock, Luxuan has to evade the monsters that rushed to her and her new riches. A strange story begins in a gloomy city…

name: LJ65
description: A homebrew puzzle game for the NES.

name: Restore
description: Main character used to live with his father and after his death is taken care of by father's aunt. He now has cousins to call him "Onii-chan", but he's not used to warm human relations. His childhood friend calls protagonist to join mechanic repair club, but he only agrees to join with motivation to repair old bike left to him by his father. As he repairs bike, gets a driving license and a part-time job, his heart gradually starts to melt, and spring of his life begins.

name: Chrono Knight
description: A homebrew for the NES in which the player controls a wave-shooting sword to fight bosses in order to protect time.

name: Currents
description:
Currents is a puzzle game about guiding ships on the open ocean.
Dodge rocks, swing on whirlpools, and outrun pirates, using only ocean currents!
And for added challenge, try to complete each level under par!

name: Doors of Doom
description: A fantasy strategy RPG made with TIC-80.

name: Kaiju Feeder
description: A homebrew for Game Boy in which the player controls an anthropomorphic helicopter who needs to carry food to giant monsters.

name: The Destiny Star of Girlfriend: Episode of Fujiko
description: A mini-episode of Destiny Star Girlfriend for the sub-heroine Yonamine Fujiko.

name: Shukusei no Girlfriend AllStar
description: Sin descripción

name: Cityquiz.io
description: Test your geography skills by quizzing yourself to see how many cities you know.

name: Five Nights with Mac Tonight 2
description:
Ever since the Mac Tonight commercials came in, McDonald's has been swarming with Customers for their new night hourly openings. One McDonald's made so much profit, they decided to step up their advertising and order a set of new animatronics to entertain the customers while they eat! That's where you come in.
The animatronics were recently shipped to a Storage Facility that McDonald's owns that keeps old belongings in there from the past moments. The animatronics are as of now being stored in there until the Staff at the McDonald's get the place set up properly before the Animatronics arrivals.
You're were hired to work in their Warehouse due to word that people have been breaking into the Warehouse, and stealing or even vandalising the property.
These animatronics were spent a fortune on, and McDonald's cannot afford having parts of them stolen or even destroyed. Don't let anyone get in.

name: Destiny 2: Echoes - Act 1
description: An aurora spreads across the stars, and from within its shimmering confines, a mysterious object materializes and falls to the surface of Nessus. Travel to the planet and begin your search for this object, known only as an Echo.

name: StarCraft: Evolution Complete
description: StarCraft: Evolution Complete is a full remake of StarCraft: Brood War, including the campaigns and all 3 races with all of their units, buildings, abilities, researches, upgrades and art.

name: Ribbit Rampage
description: An arcade-style top-down shooter where your only weapon is your froggy tongue. Eat hoardes of enemy insects in frantic, high-precision fights that demand clever decision-making. Don't get surrounded - it's one hit and you're croaked.

name: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn - Deluxe Edition
description: The Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn – Deluxe Edition includes the base game and three customization packs for Nor.

name: See Thru: Need a Friend?
description: Sin descripción

name: Polka Sheep
description: A homebrew game for Game Boy starring a sheep who escalates on spiky walls by using its fur.

name: Break an Egg
description: A homebrew game for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive in which the player controls a chicken who has to prevent falling eggs to fall on the ground, aiming to get them into a basket.

name: Duality
description:
What started out as an attempt to flirt with a cute guy lands you in the middle of a bizarre love triangle. This could've been thrilling. That is, if you weren't being tugged back and forth between two people, between romance and terror, between bliss and insanity. Choose wisely, "Main Character", for your choices might determine who gets to live and who gets to die.

Duality is an erotic horror game about two unstable individuals trying to win you over through every romantic and gruesome way possible.

name: Shadow Over the Twelve Lands
description: A dungeon-crawler first-person RPG built on TIC-80.

name: Word Trails
description: Connect scrambled letters to create words that fit into a crossword-style puzzle. Solve daily challenges as you level up in this relaxing brain game.

name: FPS80
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sky House
description: Sin descripción

name: Zelda II: Paracosm
description: This is a rom hack designed out of love for Zelda II. It has always had a dreamlike atmosphere to it, and this new adventure really leans into that aspect. Work on this hack started in summer of 2021 with the intention of only making a slightly dreamier variant of the original, but it slowly became its own distinct project. It features new overworlds, towns, dungeons, graphics, and text.

name: The White Day
description: The eighth game released by Gotmail. This game was never translated into English. The player must escape a cafe.

name: Lexibble
description: The first release from Finger Games Studio. It's a word game with roguelike mechanics that allow you to improve your letters to score the maximum points.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite & Beyond
description: A mod conversion of MVC:I that overhauls the functionality, art, and playstyle of general characters in the game, including the addition of a new 4-player, 2v2 mode where all 4 characters actively fight on-screen at the same time.

name: Sword and Plow
description:
An RPG mixed with a gardening game!

Can a farmer slay an evil dragon?
Grow and eat your food to gain strength
Drag items with the left mouse button.
Use and equip items in your inventory with a right click. Drag seeds onto the farm plot squares to either side of your inventory to grow crops.

name: The Heist of the Argonaut Limited
description: Play the part of a witless criminal, hired for a daring train heist where everything goes wrong. Made in the style of classic RPGs and text adventure games; read, roll, and choose your way through this thrilling adventure with countless paths and dozens of unique endings.

name: Trabi Racer
description: On streets in Poland and all of Europe we can still see these cars. With Trabi Racer you can expierience racing with this cultic machine. Characteristic sound of engine, box-shaped view, 5 car versions and tuned supermachines from the beggining of 1980!.

name: Find Your IF
description: Find Your IF is a browser-mobile game based on the movie IF. The game is an augmented reality experience that uses your devices camera to find imaginary friends from the movie in the real world.

name: Funny Racer
description: Funny Racer is a 3D kart racing game for young audiences. Funny Racer requires time, skills and great agillity, because opponents are really crazy!

name: Miss Moonlight
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Eternal
description: Wander a castle built of bitter memories in LOVE ETERNAL, a psychological horror platformer with devious trials and an unsettling, experimental narrative. Find a way out - or live in Shelter forever more.

name: Trapped
description: When you wake up in a prison cell, you have no memory of who you are or how you even got there. If you don't want to rot to death, it's up to you to find a way out and explore the island you've been trapped on with a girl you'll meet outside named Mila. Like you, she has no idea how she got to the island or what's going on. If you want to get out of there, both of you are going to have to work to together to escape! If you're not careful, your choices could lead to your death or you'll just have to die of old age alone. Whichever comes first.

name: Auld Lang Syne: Cat and Mouse
description:
Auld Lang Syne: Cat and Mouse is a visual novel made in RPG Maker VX Ace.

It's a Granblue Fantasy fangame about two Zodiacs of many years in the past.

You don't need to know much about Granblue Fantasy, only that its setting is a world of floating islands with its own fantasy races, and that there's a group of characters inspired on the Chinese Zodiac/the Twelve Divine Generals.

With the exception of the minor NPCs and Dormouse, it's all original characters and story.

name: Alexandra Ledermann 4: Adventures at stud
description: Alexandra Ledermann 4: Adventures at the Stud, or simply Alexandra Ledermann 4 is a horse riding video game developed by Lexis Numérique, published by Ubisoft, and published in November 2003, on PC. It belongs to the Alexandra Ledermann series.

name: Kayak VR: Mirage - Soča Valley
description: Explore the beautiful Soča Valley in Slovenia, known for its iconic green water, mountain vistas and lush nature. Take on a new thrilling challenge by paddling down whitewater rapids or explore the nature of this serene valley at your own pace.

name: Pizza Delivery: A Short Thriller
description: A horror/thriller about what may happen when delivering a pizza late at night.

name: The Smiler
description: Ride and play the Alton Towers rollercoaster "The Smiler"!

name: Vanished Anniversary
description:
A point and click detective game.

"On our 3rd anniversary, one thing (a case, something) happened.
The relationships with close friends started to fall out all of a sudden.
Everyone suspects me as a criminal, but their behavior is rather suspicious."

Collect evidence and interrogate the others.
The evidence and clues would begin to reveal the hidden truth of the disappeared anniversary.

name: Denny's Atari Remix
description:
A selection of popular Atari games with a Denny's theme.
Centipede becomes Centipup, Asteroids becomes Hashteroids and Break-Out becomes Take-Out.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: Live Emotion
description:
“Uta no Prince-sama” Live & rhythm game by 18 idols!

You can enjoy 3DMV's brilliant performance, a rhythm game that anyone can enjoy, and stories depicting the various appearances of idols.
Go to the exciting stage!

name: Murder by Candlelight
description: You're a detective on the case. An old rich man was killed during dinner time, and no one knows how. The wife, maid, and chef all say they were eating dinner together when it happened. No one got up, so how did this man end up dead?

name: Mother 2: Perfect Edition
description:
Mother 2: Perfect Edition borrows a handful of stuff from ShadowOne333’s very popular MaternalBound hack, but with great help from Tomato’s Legend of Localization website, this uncensored re-localization brings to you a more smoothed out and refined script than the MaternalBound one, and gets as close as possible to the original Japanese script without sacrificing flow or alienating American players by keeping in references that don’t make sense outside of Japan, as well as many graphical changes to make the game even more in line with its Japanese original.

Leaving personal taste out of the equation, this hack was created with the mindset of a professional editor, and with the hope that anyone, whether you’ve never played before or you’ve played dozens of times, can patch their ROM and feel comfortable knowing that they’re getting a definitive MOTHER 2 experience, just in English.

name: The Last of Us: Between The Years
description: The Last of Us: Between The Years takes place in the 20 years following Sarah's death and before the main events of the first game. It delves into Joel's character during this period and his grieving process. Explore the relationships Joel forms during this time and uncover some unexpected secrets hidden within the universe of The Last of Us. This game does not contain any spoilers for the main storyline of Part 1 or Part 2.

name: Reset
description: A short game by Robin Burkinshaw that acts as a sort of interactive music video for the song 'Rest to Reset" by Trash80

name: Bumpy Jumpy
description: Sin descripción

name: Elegy of Fate
description: Embark on a unique RPG journey as a resurrected hero. Obtain the sealed power of a malevolent deity in a ring, evading the pursuit of a goddess. Explore the world, awaken legendary heroes, and shape your destiny with a formidable order of knights. Uncover the long-buried tales of this continent.

name: Screw Drivers
description: Crazy physics and high-speed races! Craft vehicles cleverly by combining building blocks and mechanical parts to create powerful drivetrains. Unlock new parts, race for the gold, and challenge your friends in multiplayer.

name: Multiversus: Season 1 - Puns & Villainy
description: The relaunch of Multiversus comes with a new season. Included are new cometics, maps, and characters such as The Joker, Jason Voorhees, and Banana Guard

name: Aria
description: Sin descripción

name: Air Garden
description: A tiny cozy idle incremental game where you grow plants and pop bubbles to clean the air.

name: How Would You Survive?
description:
How Would You Survive? is an education program based on the book series of the same name. It covers Egyptians, Aztecs and Vikings. The premise is that it shows children the ropes of the people's lives in those time periods in case the player should become one of them. The program mostly consists of interconnected, narrated slides which contain explanations about the subject in question.

It also contains a quiz. Here the player chooses a difficulty level (which only changes the number of wrong guesses before the game is over) and is presented with 10 multiple-choice questions. The goal is to answer all questions before all wrong guesses are spent. When a wrong answer was chosen, the game creates a link to the appropriate slide. After reading it, the player can switch to the quiz and try again. Normally the quiz covers only one time period except for the masterquiz option which is about all three periods.

name: Street Cleaner 3
description: In this 8 bit retro action platformer sequel, you play as the eponymous Street Cleaner taking back the streets of San Diego from punks, ninjas, and now some weird spooky creatures! You're not alone, though. You can switch at will between the Street Cleaner, whip wielding rival turned ally Cogex, and high-school girl brawler Honoko who each bring their own attacks and abilities.

name: Misericorde Volume Two: White Wool and Snow
description:
Sister Hedwig is having a bad time.

It wasn't long ago that the Mother Superior dragged her out of her cell, forcing Hedwig to break her oath to God as an Anchoress and face the outside world. Acting as a spy for the leader of Linbarrow Abbey, Hedwig was given one seemingly simple task: Discover who really murdered Sister Catherine.

Hedwig has tried her best, but she is no closer to solving the mystery. Things just keep getting more and more complicated: Why can't any of the Sisters give her a straight answer about what happened the night of the murder? Who--or what--is the mysterious figure that haunts the abbey? And just who was Sister Catherine?

In White Wool & Snow, Sister Hedwig must steel herself. Time is running out, and so is sympathy for her situation. It's understandable that being thrust into the waking world after a life of quiet reflection as an anchoress would require some adjustment, but if Hedwig wants to save an innocent man she will have to get serious fast. Can she navigate increasingly difficult social situations, maintain her cover, and make the progress the Superior demands?

name: Kur, Pelīte, Tu Tecēji?
description: "Kur, pelīte, tu tecēji?" is a Latvian folk song about a little mouse and it's mischiefs.

name: Aliens, Plasma Guns & Chewing Gum
description: An ancient alien race only mentioned in the Necronomicon has arrived at our doorstep and started abducting people from around the globe. Humankind is threatened and our only real hope of defeating the enemies is a specially trained group of soldiers with a peculiar taste for advanced weaponry and green glowing chewing gum.

name: Alter Ego
description: Sin descripción

name: Fun Fruit Merge
description:
A different take on the highly popular watermelon merging game.

A casual game where the goal is to merge different fruits to get the watermelon, it takes inspiration from the merge 3 puzzle game format and adds it's own twist.

name: Re;Lord 3: The Demon Lord of Groessen and The Final Witch
description:
This is the third and final episode in Escu:de’s Re;Lord series. Following the liberation of Herford and Cologne, Iris was captured by Adler’s Jäger unit. Since she possessed too much sensitive information to fall into enemy hands, including the concealment of his own magic and plans for a rebellion, Wilfried pursued them into Greiz instead of going after the third witch.

Greiz is a middle-sized city in the center of Groesen, and it is home to the capitol. However, there were no trains entering the castle town, and the hustle and bustle of the past was eerily missing. Surprisingly, it was also under the territory of the third witch. He was forced to fight on two fronts, as fate also seemed to conspire against him. Wilfried’s final battle has begun.

name: Hastafa Invaders
description: Hastafa Invaders combines intense arcade shooter action with a rich storyline and dynamic characters. Players are immersed in the conflict between the Azure Dominion and the Crimson Legion, experiencing the thrill of aerial combat while unraveling the fate of the enigmatic planet Hastafa.

name: Squaretrail: Lines of The Frame
description: Squaretrail: Lines of The Frame is a puzzle and adventure game where you progress by rotating square-shaped worlds. Your main character is a cube and you have to overcome different challenges in each level.

name: Overwatch 2: Season 11 - Super Mega Ultrawatch
description: Gear up for an epic showdown as Ultrawatch faces mythic Calamity Empress Ashe, celebrate 100 million heroes with the return of Pink Mercy discover ancient mystique and modern technology in the new Runasapi map, and more!

name: Silly.tiff
description: The official sequel to Sunky.MPEG!

name: Can Shot
description:
Can Shot is a spin on the game Tin Can Alley where you throw sandbags at cans.

With the levels Funfair, Jolly Forest and Downtown, you can test your throwing skills as you rapidly throw balls at the airborne cans, fruit, bombs and mystery boxes to rack up points!

With more cans appearing as you play, seize the opportunity to hit bombs that trigger explosions and obliterate multiple cans at once for combo points! Also be on the lookout for mystery boxes that contains bonus points, extra time and bonus cans, with a small chance to hit the jackpot for all 3!

name: Pokepia: Pokecolo Utopia
description:
Welcome to the world of Pokepia!
This is our utopia, where you can wear the clothes you like, talk to the people you like, and talk about what you like.
Change into 3D clothes that can be enjoyed from any angle, and go out to your friend's star!

name: Shopping Clutter: Halloween Mystery

name: Dead Station 2
description:
Humanity has colonized the Moon and Mars. The search for extraterrestrial civilizations is among the main ideas of man. For the purpose of a more detailed study of space, as well as the search for other civilizations, research bases are being created. One such base, "TAU-9", was set up on Titan, Saturn's moon.

But one day, "TAU-9" stopped communicating. For this reason, a rescue shuttle was sent to Titan. But approaching the Titan, for some reason, the shuttle loses control...

name: Nora: The Wannabe Alchemist + Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe

name: Basketball FRVR
description:
Basketball FRVR is a simple and easy to learn, yet amazingly fun Basketball hoop shooting game. Play for as long as you can and get bonus points by not hitting the rim.

Practice your Basketball hoop shooting skills.

The game has no time limit, but the moving basket is a challenge for event experienced players.

If you like a simple basketball challenge, this is the game for you!

name: Emoji Puzzle
description: A new imagination game in which you need to connect pairs of emotions by associations. Think and find the idea of each puzzle. Just tap one by one on the elements from different columns to connect them with a line. Or drag to draw a line and connect elements from different columns. If you correctly connect all the elements, you pass the level. Harder than you think!

name: Slice It All!
description:
Tap to flip the knife and slice amazing obstacles in juiciest way!
Cut or slice everything and become slice master!

name: Unbirth
description: Unbirth is the first 3D game from Frictional Games.

name: The Grass of Genesis
description: This third-person action-adventure seems to be akin to the beloved Tomb Raider series and the adrenaline-packed John Wick film franchise. The gameplay video showcases a prototype that introduces various gameplay elements and engaging animated cinematic sequences.

name: Frogfall
description: A platformer featuring 40+ levels where you play as a hungry frog.

name: A Place in the Sun
description: A Place In The Sun is a short point & click adventure game with an interface similar to the classical games from Lucas Arts. You play the protagonist in his endeavour to make some coffee to survive yet another night of overworking, while trying to handle his complaining ex-wife as well as to cope with his bad conscience regarding his neglected daughter. For players familiar with adventure games it shouldn't take more than 30-45 minutes to complete the game, while for players unfamiliar with the genre it will probably take a bit longer.

name: Yield! Fall of Rome
description: Forge your Kingdom amidst the Ruins of Rome! As the world crumbles, rebuild civilization and shape your destiny with every decision. Unleash your strategic prowess, conquer provinces, and explore dynamically generated campaigns that promise endless challenges!

name: Kaorin Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Pawtastic Diner
description:
Pawtastic Diner is a fast-paced, high-score chasing game where you step into the shoes of a diner worker in an cat-filled world. Your mission is to serve as many customers as possible, selecting the correct ingredients for each order and delivering them swiftly before the customers leave in a huff.

Quickly pick the right ingredients, assemble the dishes in the kitchen, and bring them to the eager patrons. As you play, you'll encounter nods and easter eggs related to the german artist scene, adding a unique and playful twist to the experience.

Perfect your serving skills, beat your own high score, and enjoy the charm of this pawtastic diner.

name: Soul Blade
description: The console version of Soul Edge adds more content to the original arcade game such as new characters and additional game modes.

name: Unheil
description:
Unheil invites you to a thrilling adventure filled with suspense, where you attempt to unravel the mysteries while trying to find the murderer of a crime committed in a cursed mansion in "Unheilsdorf," a town in Northern Germany in 1930. The story begins when the case is assigned to Alexia after a traveling journalist is found dead in the mansion he was investigating.

You'll witness unprecedentedly chilling events as you try to uncover the dark secrets lurking within a cursed mansion alongside Alexia. This village has never returned any of its visitors. Will you be able to escape the clutches of this cursed village?

name: Suske en Wiske: De Texas Rakkers
description:
Suske en Wiske: De Texas Rakkers is a comic by Willy Vandersteen from 1959. It was adapted into an animated film, leading to a video game adaptation for the Nintendo DS.

In the game, you play as the young titular heroes to fight against the bandit Jim Parasijt and his henchmen in Texas. In this platform game, you experience all kinds of exciting action scenes and must solve different challenging puzzles.

name: Galaxy II
description:
"Galaxy II has all the excitement of the most sophisticated arcade games. And, it features four unique phases of action in one full cycle of play. In "phase one", you must destroy a squadron of fighters that attack in two different patterns-a zigzag and a backward -forward motion. In "phase two", another squadron attacks, this time in a circular formation.

In "phase three", the enemy command ships are vulnerable but watch out for their barrage of missiles ! Knock out all three command ships and the scoreboard gives you a "GOOD" rating.

Now you are challenged to complete a difficult docking maneuver. Your earth ship launches a space shuttle and the countdown begins. The faster you succeed in docking, the more points you will score. And, if all 5 of your earth ships have not been eliminated, you may continue to play.

If you are very skillful, you can score up to 10,000 points. And, to add to the challenge and fun, there are four skill levels from which to choose. Before playing, read on for complete directions." - Epoch Manual

name: Ghosthunter
description: Playing the role of a novice policeman, Lazarus Jones, we enter a world full of ghosts and phenomena. In the world of the game belonging to the genre of survival horror horror initiated by the series Alone in the Dark.

name: Taro the Sneaky Ninja
description: Sneaky Ninja is the stealth game Nintendo would make, a 2D stealth platformer mix of Mario and Mark of the Ninja! Classic platforming meets tactical stealth action with a wide range of difficulty modes for a game both casual and hardcore can enjoy!

name: Daxter
description:
A port of Daxter, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The game was originally released in 2006 as a spin-off of the Jak and Daxter series.

name: Wishmaker
description: Wishmaker is an RPG inspired by Deltarune and Paper Mario's combat. Full of cute animal people and pretty pixel art.

name: Kokoa
description:
"Use magical costumes to save the world from a magical magician with malicious intent!"

Kokoa is a family-friendly turn based RPG coming soon to Itch and Steam!

name: Paper Pal
description: Embark on an adorable adventure as a paper doll that came to life in a kindergarten! Fueled by a fear of being discarded, you set out to find a way to slip into your creator's backpack resting atop a towering shelf. Explore a whimsical world with a vibrant cast of sentient toys, each with their own quirks and stories to unfold!

name: Magic Knight Grand Charion
description: Take to the skies on an exciting Little Witch Academia adventure! Step onto the Grand Charion with Akko and friends as they battle their way through monsters in the sky and ground. Watch as the Grand Charion transforms and puts you into the cockpit and fight your way to the high score. Download the Little Witch Academia Magic Knight Grand Charion mini-game now!

name: Miro and the Flower of Youth
description:
Miro is a single-player, 2.5D action RPG where you embark on a heartwarming journey of exploration, platforming, and rebuilding. Take control of Miro, a mutant with a big heart, and set out to restore your hometown and surrounding areas after a nuclear fallout caused by his creator, Vitto.

Explore vibrant yet desolate environments teeming with secrets and hidden areas waiting to be discovered. The game rewards curiosity and exploration, offering extra challenge and replayability for those who seek it.

Dive into turn-based combat that allows you to strategize your moves and abilities. Action commands during battles add an interactive element, increasing engagement and rewarding skillful timing. Unique partners with diverse abilities join you on your journey, offering strategic options in both combat and exploration.

A richly crafted narrative unfolds as you explore the world, uncovering its mysteries and meeting unforgettable characters. The game’s lighthearted atmosphere and humorous tone create a fun and memorable experience.

Intuitive controls and easy-to-understand mechanics make the game welcoming to players of all skill levels. Playful and whimsical art style with a focus on creating a cheerful and inviting atmosphere.

name: Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons Edition
description: New to The Fog? Check out Dead by Daylight: Dungeons & Dragons Edition, which includes the base game, the Dungeons and Dragons Chapter, and 2 Dungeons & Dragons Outfits: Baermar's Roadside Ambush and Vecna's Whispered One.

name: Story Time Bundle
description: This bundle features the games of the Life of Fly series and the Murder Diaries series. It is a pack of 5 story driven flight exploration games. In each of the games you will experience an exciting story while exploring the landscapes and piecing together the overall story

name: Under the Jolly Roger + Crossroads Inn: Bring Me That Horizon Bundle
description:
Under The Jolly Roger
Trade, fight and explore on your own! Set your foot on the land to plunder it!

Crossroads Inn
Build and manage your tavern! Make visiting adventurers happy, and your services famous all over the land.

name: Construction Simulator: Titanium Edition
description: The Construction Simulator - Titanium Edition is your perfect entry into the fascinating world of construction and heavy machinery.

name: Pizza Quest
description: Join the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles in their quest to defeat evil and eat pizza. In Nickelodeon's free and fun online action game, you can play as Michelangelo, Raphael, Donatello and Leonardo and take down baddies in the mean streets of New York City. It's up to you to use the Turtles' special abilities to save the world from enemies like the Kraang, the Foot Clan and more. Take on multiple bosses at once to beat the game! Play Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Pizza Quest and other free online quizzes and games now at Nick.com.

name: Lost Chiko 2
description:
The 2nd game in the Lost Chiko series, this time with a different adventure, a different story and a different gameplay!
One day while we were sleeping under a tree, a bird comes and tells us that our mother has been kidnapped.

name: Fallout 76: Skyline Valley - Deluxe Edition
description: Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of Skyrim and Fallout 4, welcome you to Fallout 76. Twenty-five years after the bombs fell, you and your fellow Vault Dwellers—chosen from the nation's best and brightest - emerge into post-nuclear America on Reclamation Day, 2102. Explore a vast wasteland, devastated by nuclear war, in this open-world multiplayer addition to the Fallout story.

description: A penguin races through the ice for its family. Sometimes sliding, sometimes flying, it overcomes numerous challenges. "Penguin Take-Off!!" is a side-scrolling sliding action game. Despite its catchy graphics, players will experience a tension where not a single mistake is permitted.

name: Solitar: Retro Picks
description: Solitar Retro Picks is a collection of relaxing and challenging solitaire games, perfect to play while listening to an audio book or while binge watching your latest favorite TV series.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Sundarpatan Nepal Hunting Reserve
description: Brave the beauty at the stunning Sundarpatan Nepal Hunting Reserve. Hunt among three distinct climate regions and go in pursuit of 10 new animal species.

name: Fray
description: FRAY Game is a rhythm based puzzle game about two brothers Tullio and Ziya. Take control of Tullio to move to the beat and master energy blasting dance moves to light the way through a maze-like world of dance challenges and to battle cunning enemies who attempt to break the bond between brothers.

name: Physical Spheres
description: Physical Spheres is a physics based puzzle game. The goal is to create chains of similarly colored spheres that connect to positive (+) and negative (-) terminals. At present this is the left and right side of the current game area, but in future updates there will be more elaborate game areas.

name: Espire 1: Sydney Sneakabouts Mission Pack
description: Deploy Espire Model 1 on 10 thrilling Stealth Action missions in the Sydney Sneakabouts Mission Pack. The Sydney Sneakabouts DLC features 2 sprawling environments and adds 10 new missions to Espire 1's ‘Virtual Challenges' game mode and caters to fans of the stealth or ‘all guns blazing' approaches.

name: Talon One: Bounty Hunter
description: Fast paced open galaxy shooter. Upgrade your ship, save your team mates and reclaim your position as the leader of the most feared fighter pilots in the galaxy!

name: Just a Lullaby
description: Explore Just a Lullaby, an atypical, shooter top down. Navigate eerie 2D worlds, solve puzzles, and unveil secrets in a quest for truth. At the moment, the use of the controller is limited. But you can use it to play with.

name: Exit16: Byilhan Hotel
description:
"Exit16: Byilhan Hotel" is a "walking simulator" & "Spot the Difference" game. The game challenges players to unravel hidden anomalies strewn across the enigmatic corridor of the Byilhan Hotel.

Each floor of the hotel presents a unique canvas, with some adorned by the peculiarities of anomalies while others maintain an eerie semblance of normalcy. Your task is to discern the subtle nuances that distinguish the ordinary from the extraordinary, as every object, every angle, and every shadow holds a potential clue.
Traverse the hallways with caution, for not all anomalies reveal themselves readily.

If you suspect there is an anomaly, turn back. If you believe everything is normal, that there are no anomalies, do not turn back and continue down the corridor. If you make a mistake, you will know by looking at the level number. If the number has increased, you have made the correct choice. If you return to level 1, you have made a mistake and will need to start over (the anomalies will be different). The goal is to reach the final level.

Navigate the twists and turns of the Byilhan Hotel, unraveling its mysteries one anomaly at a time.

name: Modern Museum
description: Moderum museum is a mysterious, horror, escape game. Only single-play supported. You should collect relics from endless rooms of museum and put them in the right display case. Be careful of monsters and guards since they are chasing you.

name: Tropico 6: Tropican Shores
description: A new age is dawning upon Tropico as El Presidente turns toward the great Blue Gold that surrounds its shores: Tropico 6 - Tropican Shores brings you tons of new opportunities to build and expand your island - on the ocean.

name: East Defense
description: East DefenseYour duty is to protect the castle by strategically building & upgrading towers to stop monsters from coming their way!

name: Turmoil
description: Turmoil is a 3D isometric top-down action roguelike game. Inspired by a dieselpunk aesthetic, navigate a winding factory space filled with environmental hazards and hostile robot workers with the goal of survival. Rise from the ashes! Show the boss that a worker is more than their mechanical parts.

description: Run through Mexico's finest roads in the 2018 BMW #1 BMW M Motorsport M8 GTE, 2015 Cadillac #3 Cadillac Racing ATS-V.R, 2020 Chevrolet #3 Corvette Racing C8.R, 2020 Lexus #14 VASSER SULLIVAN RC F GT3, and three more Apex All-Stars!

name: No Vacation for an Executioner
description: It's a a Dark Fantasy Action-RPG about a frustrated executioner in late 17th century. He ran away from the gallows. It aroused a riot of monsters, he had to clean up this cruel mess, and find out the truth of this crazy world.

name: Gyras: Rogue
description: A Spinning Top RPG with in-depth customization, exciting battles, and crazy platforming.

name: Painting VR: Cozy Cabin

description: Oriental Valley × Village Head Yiang Crossover Bundle DLC.Contains two main character costumes

name: Ylands: Supporter Pack
description: Indulge in exclusive aesthetic and show off your support of the game with this pack full of unique cosmetic items. The cosmetic items included in this Supporter pack cannot be obtained in any other way.

name: Hell Let Loose: Oak Leaf
description: Emerge from the foliage with this autumn version of the iconic Oak Leaf camo pattern that was used by troops throughout WW2.

name: Photochemistry
description: Photochemistry is a challenging 2D puzzle game about synthesizing chemicals to sustain plant life in a post-apocalyptic setting. Design and construct elaborate mechanisms to produce complex compounds from simple particles.

name: Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune
description:
Prepare yourself for an exhilarating journey filled with a brand new collection of adventures in Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable voyage into uncharted territories and discover the mysteries that await!

Explore new ages with the promise of swordfights, ship battles, pirates and maybe even treasure (?!) as you sail into uncharted waters and navigate the age of the buccaneers. What other exciting new eras may Wanderer 2: The Seas of Fortune unlock for eager time travelers?

name: Acts of Blood
description: Acts of Blood is a Beat ‘em up, Action, 3rd person game which focuses on fast-paced, brutal hand-to-hand combat. Set in dystopian city of Bandung, Indonesia.

name: Mortal Kombat Mobile
description: Get over here and immerse yourself in the iconic and visceral action of MORTAL KOMBAT MOBILE anytime, anywhere. Kollect legendary fighters like Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Raiden, and Kitana and fight in epic 3v3 battles set in the Mortal Kombat universe. This visually stunning fighting and card collection game has multiple modes and re-introduces characters and lore from Mortal Kombat’s 30-Year fighting game legacy. Launch into the action today and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament in all of the realms!

name: Sokoban
description: A mod for Dinothawr which implements four levels from the original Sokoban game.

name: Maestro: The Masterclass
description: Step on the podium and become a true orchestra conductor in Maestro: The Masterclass. Play hands free or grab a chopstick and master the real hands motions that command the orchestra through an off the rail conducting masterclass that culminates with an epic symphonic concert in a packed opera house. Good luck, Maestro!

name: Stripes
description:
Stripes is a Tetris-inspired puzzle game that requires players to strategically place stripe pieces to create a continuous loop beginning and ending at the starting point.

With increasing speed, players must use critical thinking and quick reflexes to connect the stripes before time runs out. With a sleek and colorful design, Stripes offers hours of entertainment for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages.

name: Nu: Carnival Bliss
description: A BL visual novel and gacha game for iOS and Android.

name: Tomb Raider: Legend
description:
This is an emulation of the classic PS2 action-adventure title, Tomb Raider: Legend, playable on PS4 and PS5 for the first time.

Follow Lara Croft down a path of discovery as she travels the globe to remote, exotic locales in search of one of history's greatest artifacts that unleashes unwelcome figures from Lara's mysterious past. With guns blazing, Lara must use her athletic ability and intellectual wits to explore vast, treacherous tombs, riddled with challenging puzzles and deadly traps. Experience an adrenaline-fueled adventure in Tomb Raider: Legend!

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Star Luster

The player uses the Star luster “G.A.I.A” to fight the invader “Battura” who is trying to cause a big bang. Defend your base from enemies by switching between Map Mode, where you choose which enemies to attack, and Combat Mode in the battle space.

name: WraithRun
description: WraithRun is a cyberpunk-themed classic arcade-style game in first person. Escape the maze by collecting all the orbs, but avoid the deadly wraiths.

name: One in a Krillion
description: Prepare for deep-sea action! Lead swarms of krill against predators looking for their next meal. Utilize the strength of a krillion krill to swat away your enemies. With hammers, scissors, and more unique construct abilities, master the way of the krill and lay claim to your home.

name: Heroes of Higher Realms
description: Command a powerful army of heroes and towers to defend your realm from the forces of darkness in Heroes of Higher Realms, the epic tower defense game!

name: Air Combat MF: Echoes of War
description: This game is a simple third-person 3D flight shooting arcade game. Control the aircraft (MF-100) to destroy enemy ground weapons and aircraft, and complete the missions.

name: Venari: Escape Room Adventure
description: Embark on an epic adventure to an ancient, mysterious island where your escape room puzzle skills will be put to the test. In Venari, uncover the secrets hidden on the island and discover the legendary Venari artefact.

name: Shoot to Shoot
description: Shoot balls with a gun, using physics collisions to push them into the basket. Test your precision and strategy to the limit.

name: Space Horde Attack
description: Collect weapons and destroy enemy ships

name: Beauty Solitaire
description: "Beauty Solitaire" is a delicate card game featuring beautiful girls. On top of the classic solitaire casual gameplay, you can also choose the rank mode to compete with global players in terms of the speed of completing the game, enjoying a unique gaming experience.

name: Space
description: SPACE is an atmospheric horror game set in eerie, abandoned structures floating in space. Explore labyrinthine corridors, face unsettling encounters, and endure the psychological tension of cosmic isolation. Discover the haunting beauty and terror lurking in the unknown

name: Box Wrangler
description: Satisfyingly collect orbs and slay demons using 3 distinct boxes, 6 primary and 3 secondary unlock-able weapons.

name: TouchNothing
description: 3D view, first person but no person，challenge yourself，several levels，A torture game.

name: Threshold Sector
description: You've been stranded by your company in a section of the facility known as "threshold sector". You'll have to find weapons, meds and equipment to survive and try to escape the complex. But be as careful as possible: everything down here wants you dead.

name: Spaced Liberation
description: Spaced Liberation is a very small indie game about the liberation of a planet.

name: Gravity Surge
description: A puzzle shooter with intuitive and physics-accurate gravity changing abilities. Use your ability to change gravity to solve puzzles, fly through levels and dodge enemy attacks, then target enemy weak-points with one of your guns to disable or destroy them.

name: Dead War Rise of Zombies
description: The zombie apocalypse, a reality that transcends the pages of the most terrifying nightmares, rises as an ominous threat. The social order, once solid and organized, dissolves into an unbridled collapse, giving way to a desperate struggle for survival.

name: Trasmoz Legends
description: Introducing a brand new retro arcade game designed exclusively for modern computers and consoles, drawing inspiration from the classic Trasmoz Saga for ZX Spectrum and the Amstrad CPC.

name: Broken Ceiling
description: Broken Ceiling is a hand drawn, 2D, top-down eldritch horror adventure video game. Set in deep dark caverns the main mechanic is the light field around the character that needs to be repeatedly recharged to be able to explore the secrets of the game.

name: You Want to Watch the World Burn
description: YWTWTWB is a fast-paced puzzle in which you are an arsonist burning locations and landmarks to the ground. Balance risk versus reward with the amount of havoc you can cause while staying alive!

name: Lost Moment
description: Look for various anomalies happening in your apartment. If you do everything correctly — time will move forward. If not — you will return. Good night.

name: Knock
description: "Knock is a Clicker game that challenges you to accumulate points by tapping on the lid of your coffin. Get ready to immerse yourself in the eerie yet captivating world of Knock!"

name: Room of lust
description: Which girl are you having fun with tonight? A total of 19 heroines! With a combination of 6 hairstyles, 6 hair colors, and 3 skin types, you can enjoy a total of 2052 variations! Enjoy being naughty with a girl alone in a secret room.

name: Polaris
description: Team up and take flight in this sci-fi co-op shooter with fully destructible environments. Soar through dynamic open levels using powerful abilities, unearth the coveted secrets of Polaris, and lay waste to the hostile cityscapes of a colonizing threat— reclaim your homeworld!

name: Roulette to Hell
description: It is a Russian Roulette game. Roulette is played with shotguns according to certain rules, the last survivor wins. There are multiple game modes. Where you can have fun with your friends or compete with other people.

name: Pager
description: 1-bit 3D Kafkaesque horror in a 90s office building. Obey the pager to survive your first day at work.

name: Adulting
description: Growing older has nothing to do with feeling grown up. Face the challenges of adulthood with Liv, Albert and Finja in this interactive visual novel by exploring their everyday lives through point-and-click interactions as well as mini games and figure out the secrets of how to be an adult!

name: One Room Nightmare
description: Turn-based strategy horror. Terror in a confined space. Manage your limited power and time to protect yourself from the oncoming enemies and survive until dawn.

name: Pneumatic Panic
description: Pneumatic Panic is a physics-based chaotic co-op road trip game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow companions must arrive at the campgrounds with your supplies, avoiding obstacles along the way.

name: The Cake
description: Deliver a birthday cake to your beloved daughter! Avoid oncoming passersby and aim for the goal! If the cake collapses when it hits someone, you will die instantly! A casual but highly difficult action game.

name: Veilcrest: Trial of The Arcane
description: School life in the Veilcrest Academy turned out to be more complicated than you expected. A magical world of wonder opens up as three magical men take special interest in you.

name: Bloodsaint
description: BLOODSAINT is not a remaster of a 94's retro-hardcore minigame about a cleric performing a ritual for a ruthless syntetic deity, but pretty close.

name: LavaLoop
description: LavaLoop is a music-driven shoot'em up, in a hand-drawn Steampunk universe. Face a mad queen and destroy the planet killing machine. Play as three musician fighters and jump from surprise to surprise in this unique fantasy universe.

name: Downware
description: You have a date with your girlfriend Lucy, but nothing will go as planned. The cyclops Mark-13 is enforcing martial law. Dive into the dark and immersive world of DownWare, a first-person cyberpunk horror game.

name: Survivor
description: A retro 80's arcade-style top-down zombie shooter where you upgrade weapons, collect loot, and battle through increasing waves of undead and challenging bosses.

name: Manga RPG
description: An original story embedded with manga, comic books, video games, and pop culture! Discover manga RGP adventure through the visual novel format with plenty of humor and hilarious references. Enjoy hundreds of original illustrations, accessible to all players for free.

name: Cursed Labyrinth Redux
description: Incomparable deck building new type hack & slash card battle game is reborn!

name: Alpha Rooms
description: This is Alpha Rooms, "It was created to experience infinite possibilities with infinite pleasure."

name: Secrets of Magonia
description: In this tower defense you enter the world of Magonia and defend it against hordes of humans, orcs, ogres and other evil forces. Fight in green graslands, dusty deserts, rocky hills, lush forests and icy tundras, adapting your strategy to the terrain and the enemy forces.

name: Yoba2D
description: A 2D shooter with unusual movement mechanics, because our character has a simple circle with a face. You have to explore complex abstract worlds and fight with other players and abstract personalities using quite familiar weapons.

name: Cosmic Parkour: Infinite Journey
description: You made an invention that has allowed you to go to any dimension you wish, when suddenly, somebody has taken that device and has used it to send you to a set of dimensions known as Cosmic Parkour. Can you escape the Cosmic Parkour?

name: Trio Tactics TD
description: Dive into our exciting Tower Defense game! Choose from three unique towers and utilize specialized skill trees and powerful abilities. Develop your strategy, defeat various enemies, and become the ultimate defense strategist!

name: SCP: Site Director
description: An SCP Facility Management game with strong visual stylings that allows you to run your own SCP Foundation Sites, capture anomalies, hire staff to contain and research them, and recontain them when they escape. Orchestrate multiple sites and guide your clandestine organization to success!

name: Frostflame
description: Frostflame is a Brazilian Soulslike developed by a single person. In the game you control Chihiro, disciples of the great master Hori Masashi on a mission to advance to the lowlands and bring back peace, ending the war of the five kingdoms and eliminating the power of the Frstlame.

name: City Lights Love Bites Season 0
description: MC gets a fresh start after quitting his job and moving to the city of RoshVale. In RoshVale, he will encounter six main female characters. Will he find his perfect match under the city lights, or will he be a player driven by lust? The choice is yours!

name: Monster Meals
description: Monster Meals is a fast-paced cooking game where you control a small monster chef in your food truck, preparing meals with exotic creatures for monstrous customers. Serve quickly, or you’ll be on the menu!

name: Framework: Found Footage
description: Through the lens of VHS camera, you are given the task of unraveling the twisted framework of seemingly never-ending liminal spaces, also known as the backrooms. Explore unique narrative driven themes of solitude, mystery, and horror.

name: Hurricane Abyss
description: It is a space simulation adventure game that combines spacecraft control and planet exploration.

name: Lunar New Year
description: Apart from the Year "is a shooting adventure 2D horizontal version of the game developed by Emu Shanhai Studio. The game takes the legend of the zodiac as the background, integrates traditional Chinese cultural elements, and strives to let players experience a strong Chinese cultural atmosphere .

name: Miner Vidis
description: Join the adventure of Vidis, a robot miner who smashes rocks and mines Gemstones. Classic color-based puzzles where simple rules, different strategies, and order are important.

name: Hetu
description: "Hetu" is an ink painting-style CCG themed around cultivation. In the game, players build decks based on the unique characteristics of heroes from three races: Humans, Monsters, and Gods, to compete in battles.

name: Mystopia
description: Mystopia is a relaxing sandbox game about building your own worlds and crafting magical potions. Discover blocks inspired by witchcraft, use potions for mystifying effects and build your dream worlds! The only limit is your imagination!

name: Undo The Jam Damage
description: Bruce's love for PB&J sandwiches has entangled him in a spellbinding predicament. Venture into the enchanted forest to help Bruce lift the witch’s curse. Tread carefully, though—the woods are fraught with dangers for the unprepared.

name: Deadbeat Wizard
description: Follow Garth and Pigeon as they discover and solve occult mysteries in this action-rpg shooter.

name: Transit Loop
description: Escape from an Anomalous Looping Subway through the Appropriate Exit.

name: Versus Purgatory
description: Versus Purgatory is a micro-roguelike shoot-em-up with mind-bending gameplay inwhich you delve into a dungeon, controlling two characters at the same time.

name: Artificial Gravity Cat
description: 2D physics platformer! Control a cat in space and gravity itself!

name: Fantasy Shootoff
description: Fantasy Shootoff is a free PvPvE fantasy game where you fight against enemy npcs or have a duel with your friends on one big map filled with crazy weapons, story and much more. Play Single player and level up your character or jump into Multiplayer and kill enemies or just hang out with others

name: Office Odyssey
description: Office Odyssey is a laugh-out-loud adventure that pokes fun at the absurdity of corporate culture. With its casual roguelike mechanics, every run is unique, offering endless replayability and a constantly evolving office landscape.

name: Lunar Eclipse
description: Ealish, the sole survivor, hides in the shadows, seeking shelter from the merciless creatures that now dominate this devastated world. Immerse in the grim atmosphere of what’s happening. Fight for life, create anew, explore the unknown, become a hunter in a world where everyone has become prey!

name: Panic In Store!
description: You play a supermarket employee who must (in each level and within a given time) put the right boxes in the right departments. But be careful! Customers will come after you to waste your time!

name: Garden of Táozi
description: In this stylized, 3D sliding block puzzle adventure, play as a cute version of Sun Wukong as he goes on a quest to collect the legendary Golden Peach of Healing! Push blocks and collect peaches to progress forward!

name: The Lost Compressor
description: A violence-free top-down puzzle adventure for everyone interested in engineering.

name: Path For The Seeker
description: Path For The Seeker is a detective adventure in which a young nun investigates the disappearance of a famous inventor in a city on the border of two worlds.

name: 7th Floor
description: Find your missing daughter in the Hospital of Madness. Collect items, fight enemies, and do whatever it takes to reach her!

name: Welcome Back, Commander
description: Commander, your strike team is to dive deep into the contaminated city of Sun Stone and get some answers before the mysterious deadly plague spreads beyond the city limits. Good luck Commander!

name: Freezer Frenzy
description: Freezer Frenzy is an action packed arcade drift-racing game set in a supermarket. Race to the exit as quickly as you can while completing challenges on the way!

name: Dog Walking Simulator
description: Dog Walking Simulator: Walk a menagerie of dogs and do your best to bring them happy, healthy, and satisfied. Take care of your own pets as well and even open your own dog-related business!

name: Alerta Roja
description: Space-themed action and skill game.

name: Dimensional Phobos Threat
description: Dimensional Phobos Threat You are trapped in a cursed place in this horror investigation game for 1 to 4 players that you can play with your friends. The only way to lift the curse is to search the place and find and destroy the cursed items according to the clues

name: Tamer: King of Dinosaurs
description: A survival/action/dating sim with an interactive world based on the best selling harem novel series by Michael-Scott Earle. Fight, hunt, and tame dinosaurs, craft weapons and tools, build a fort to protect the alien women you love, and experience a romance story like no other.

name: S-Project 66
description: Survive this nightmare by hiding in your surroundings. Be discreet, because death will be final.

name: The Day Of Survival
description: The Day Of Survival Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world where every decision is crucial. "The Day Of Survival" is a thrilling survival game that challenges players to explore a harsh, unforgiving landscape filled with zombies and enemy soldiers.

name: Slimecore
description: Slimecore combines arena combat, rogue-like power progression, and slick slime rail grinds into a high-octane team-based hero shooter. Creative builds, dynamic teamfights, endless ways to play – unleash your slime and see what you can do.

name: Necromage
description: Be a necromancer who can learn to summon any creature from the world. Level up and equip your minions by crafting enchanted spells to use on them. All this takes place in an isometric action-RPG with intense combat and powerful bosses that will require your army of minions to defeat.

name: Tenalatro
description: The Strategy-Puzzle Roguelike. Tenalatro scratches your casual chill problem solving itch, every run has a random collection of game changing modifiers, hacks, and new shapes. Want to compete? Global Leaderboards, a head-to-head match with friends, and the Daily Challenge are for you!

name: Rogue Rollout
description: Rogue Rollout is a roguelike deckbuilder where you score points in a Yahtzee-style dice game, choose powerful artifacts, and face challenging impairments as you push through endless levels.

name: Dash n Cry
description: DASH n CRY is a fast-paced, challenging 2D Precision Platformer game for those who want to put their skills to their limits. Jump and dash your way through a young astronaut's training routine inside his spaceship.

name: Qazaq: Son of the Sun
description: Qazaq: Son of the Sun - a single-player first-person open-world game with puzzles set in Kazakhstan, where you are the last surviving Qazaq saved by the Sun God.

name: Jigs4w3D: Puzzle Challenge
description: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy the immersive 3D environments and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. Choose from different categories and solve all 20 puzzles on 5 difficulty settings for completely free or grab your favourite DLC.

How would that feel solving puzzles at work after all your colleagues went home? Try it now in the Loft Office Environment DLC.

description: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy this immersive 3D environment and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. How would that feel solving puzzles far from the noise of a bustling city? Try it now in the Futuristic Apartment Environment DLC.

name: Jigs4w3D: My Photos DLC
description: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy the immersive 3D environments and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. How would that feel solving puzzles generated by your own photos? Search no further and try it now in the My Photos DLC.

Participate in 12 games and build a city around Olympic venues.

Featuring archery, artistic gymnastics, athletics - 100m, basketball, breaking, cycling track, fencing, golf, rowing, shooting - skeet, skateboard - park, and swimming - 100m freestyle.

name: .If All The Lonely Nights.
description:
.if all the lonely nights. is a game based on a personal experience, one that happened to myself one early morning in the spring of 2024, in Malaga.

Dealing with whatever feelings have always been difficult for me—even if they are not necessarily unpleasant or sad—and, to my surprise, I have found in video games a way to channel this pressurized stream of complex thoughts.

If at any time you feel overwhelmed by the emotions that certain situations generate in you, I encourage you to try to create something with all of that. Although it doesn't have to be a little game, redirecting all that expressive power into a creative exercise can be a wonderful way to let off steam.

3rees is a homebrew game which is an adaptation of 2048 with added extra rules.
There are 3 game modes: 768 which is to acheive score of 768 as fast as possible, Long which is obtaining as high score as possible until maximum limit reached, and Time where you have 3 minutes to gain as much score as you can.

That CD was also including screensavers, wallpapers and demo versions of first two Harry Potter games. After completing Skurge Challenge the players could get access to a secret level within Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets video game. description: Shovel Knight: Shovel of Hope DX is an enhanced edition of the pixel-perfect adventure. Jump, battle foes, and dig up treasure as you quest to defeat the Order of No Quarter and The Enchantress. DX adds 20 playable characters, online multiplayer, and new features like rewind and save states.
